name: Music_636.wav
keywords: ['ambient song', 'flute', 'synth layers', 'birds chirping', 'tambourine', 'sounds of nature', 'bass drum', 'slow tempo', 'instrumental', 'no voices', 'meditative music', 'yoga music']
caption: This ambient song features a main melody played on a flute. It is accompanied by percussion playing beats on the bass drum only. A tambourine is played on one count in every bar. There are the sounds of chirping birds in the background. This song also has layers of synth playing tribal-style instruments. The mood is meditative. This song can be used in meditation or in a yoga session.
